basics.summary: I am majoring in Management Information Systems at the University of Hawaii at Manoa. I expect to graduate in Fall, 2023.

work.summary: High Capacity Line of Sight (HCLOS) Operator
work.highlights: Responsible for communication devices and equipment that communicate through more than one channel. Responsible for installation, repair, operation and maintenance check of these devices, antennae and associated equipment.

awards.title: Armed Forces Service Medal
awards.summary: Medal awarded to those with qualifying military service who are part of a U.S. mission with significant activity and who encounter no foreign armed opposition or imminent hostile action.

awards.title: Armed Achievement Medal
awards.summary: The AMA recognizes outstanding achievement or meritorius service of military personnel.
